FileType.description: File type of FileData.  ie. pdf, png, jpg, html etc.

ImplantCount.description: Amount of implants connected to the operation

Info.description: Info for the header of that page

LineNumber.description: Line number of contact.  Use to update.  Sent null when adding contact

IsPrimary.description: Sets as primary contact when = 1 else 0

IsActive.description:
is this an active registration
set = 1 when active else 0

will this contact receive notifications about status of operation
set = 1 when active else 0

CanGiveInfo.description: Contact can give information when = 1 else 0
